data.title: Charles Taylor
data.meta_description: We have offices strategically placed around the world to be where our clients are based and where our services are needed.  We have over 3,000 staff in 120 locations spread across 30 countries in the UK, the Americas, Asia Pacific, Europe, the Middle East and Africa.
data.text:
Charles Taylor is a global provider of services and technology solutions to the insurance market.

We aim to transform the global insurance market by enabling our clients to outperform. Our highly-skilled team covers every area of expertise relating to insurance. Our geographic reach covers the entire globe. We can resolve any insurance related matter, whenever and wherever it occurs in the world.

Scroll through the map to discover our locations across the globe. If you would like to get in touch, please use the contact us form below.

Find out more about Charles Taylor Adjusting and Technical Services globally in:

Asia

Australia
